CoverGas

Contains logic to manage the machine cover gas functionality

Functions
SuppressErrors
call CoverGas.SuppressErrors(
flag
);

Enables/disables cover gas error monitoring

Parameters
flag

TRUE to suppress cover gas error monitoring, FALSE to enable. Cover gas error monitoring is enabled by default

On
call CoverGas.On();

Turns on the cover gas main valve

Off
call CoverGas.Off();

Turns off the cover gas main valve

Select
call CoverGas.Select(
valveNumber
);

Pick the desired cover gas input valve

Parameters
valveNumber

cover gas input valve, 1, 2, or 3

SetGasPressure
call CoverGas.SetGasPressure(
pressure
);

Sets the cover gas pressure in PSI

Parameters
pressure

cover gas target pressure in PSI

GetGasPressure
call CoverGas.GetGasPressure(
&actualPressure
);

Gets the current cover gas pressure in PSI

Response Parameters
&actualPressure

cover gas pressure in PSI

SetGasPressureInMPA
call CoverGas.SetGasPressureInMPA(
pressure
);

Sets the cover gas pressure in MPA

Parameters
pressure

cover gas target pressure in MPA

GetGasPressureInMPA
call CoverGas.GetGasPressureInMPA(
&actualPressure
);

Gets the current cover gas pressure in MPA

Response Parameters
&actualPressure

cover gas pressure in MPA
